channel.title: Cloud on Knowledge Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud on Knowledge Hub

item.title: Synology DS218Play
item.description: How to connect to synology NAS # for anonymous access smb://<NAS_IP_ADDRESS> smb://192.168.2.11 # access with authentication # if you want to be prompted for the password smb://user_name@ip_address_of_nas smb://user_name:*@server_name smb://sriram@192.168.2.11 # with user_name and password smb://user_name:password@ip_address_of_nas Search for synology in local network http://find.quickconnect.to/
